message_1: Suppose you want to encrypt the message "HELLO" using Caesar cipher with a right shift of 3. What would be the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO" using Caesar cipher with a right shift of 3, you would shift each letter in the message 3 positions to the right in the alphabet. 

H -> K
E -> H
L -> O
L -> O
O -> R

The encrypted message would be "KHOOR".
